honolulu.neighborhoods: Downtown, Waikiki, Kaka ªako, Manoa, Ala Moana, Makiki, Punchbowl
honolulu.meetingHighlights: Dense island meetings across neighborhoods with strong newcomer services, many beachside and evening groups, and bilingual offerings.
honolulu.transitInfo: TheBus provides comprehensive island coverage; Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (HNL) handles inter-island and international flights.

hilo.neighborhoods: Downtown Hilo, Waiakea, Wainaku, Hilo Bay
hilo.meetingHighlights: Community-focused island meetings often held in churches and community centers; active outreach to rural Big Island communities.
hilo.transitInfo: Hawaii County Hele-On bus service and local shuttles; Hilo International Airport (ITO) for inter-island flights.

kahului.meetingHighlights: Central meeting hub for Maui with groups in Kahului and Wailuku; many meetings accommodate seasonal residents and visitors.
kahului.transitInfo: Maui Bus provides island transit; Kahului Airport (OGG) is the main gateway to Maui.

kailua.neighborhoods: Kailua Town, Lanikai, Enchanted Lake, Waimanalo (nearby)
kailua.meetingHighlights: Beachside and neighborhood meetings with active newcomer engagement; many lunchtime and evening groups popular with families.
kailua.transitInfo: TheBus connects Kailua to Honolulu and other Windward communities; Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (HNL) is accessible by highway.

kapolei.neighborhoods: Kapolei Town Center, Ko Olina, Makakilo, Nanakuli (nearby)
kapolei.meetingHighlights: Rapidly growing suburban meetings with family-oriented evening groups and community-center meetings in Kapolei Town.
kapolei.transitInfo: TheBus service and highway access to Honolulu; Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (HNL) reachable by car.
